mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_permission( appId, parentId, icon, name, url, sort, isMenu, isEnable ) VALUES ( #{appId}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{name}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{isMenu}, #{isEnable} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_permission a SET a.`appId` = #{appId}, a.`parentId` = #{parentId}, a.`icon` = #{icon}, a.`name` = #{name}, a.`url` = #{url}, a.`sort` = #{sort}, a.`isMenu` = #{isMenu}, a.isEnable = #{isEnable} WHERE a.`id` = #{id}
mapper.delete:

AND appId in #{item}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT p.id, p.parentId, p.name, p.url, p.icon, p.isMenu, p.sort FROM sys_permission p
INNER JOIN sys_re_role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rp.roleId AND r.isEnable = 1 INNER JOIN sys_re_user_role ur ON ur.roleId = r.id
WHERE 1 = 1 AND p.isEnable = 1
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_app a WHERE a.id = p.appId AND a.isEnable = 1 AND a.code = #{appCode})
AND ur.userId = #{userId}
ORDER BY p.parentId ASC, p.sort DESC
